CustomField.description: BODEV-81: a formula to indicate whether the associated Opportunity was influenced by Salesforce.
CustomField.formula: OR( AND( NOT(ISBLANK( Opportunity__r.OEM__c )), CONTAINS(Opportunity__r.OEM__r.Name, "Salesforce") ), Is_SF_added_as_other_partner__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If the associated opportunity have Salesforce in Partner Account field, that means the opportunity was influenced by Salesforce.
CustomField.label: Is influenced by Salesforce
